title: Spring snow blankets Northeast

organizations.name: reuters news agency | brand attribution guidelines | careers  reuters

text:
Spring snow blankets Northeast 9:05am EDT - 00:39 
Parts of the U.S. Northeast are seeing several inches of early spring snow. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
